DOC.brief_summary: This safety study evaluate bimatoprost 0.01 % 0.03 % patient glaucoma ocular hypertension ( OHT ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Study Bimatoprost Patients With Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension
